cz.cvut.fel.dbs.smartorchestra.model.dao

Class EventHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cvut.fel.dbs.smartorchestra.model.dao.DAOThreadSafe
      • cz.cvut.fel.dbs.smartorchestra.model.dao.EventHandler

  • public class EventHandler
extends DAOThreadSafe
    This is a DAO for manipulating Events entities. This class can be use in multiple threads.
    Author:
    Matěj Bartoň (bartom47@fel.cvut.cz)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteEvent(Events event)
      Deletes given event and all dependencies from the database.
      List<Events> getAllEvents()
      Loads all active events from the database.
      List<Events> getAllEvents(Users user)
      Loads all active events from the database related to given user.
      Events getEvent(Integer evid)
      Finds Events entity in the database based on its primary key.
      List<Events> getNextEvents(Date date)
      Loads new list of active events including selected date and the events after this date.
      List<Events> getNextEvents(Date date, Sections section)
      Loads list of events where there is relation to given section and the events date is equal or greater than given date.
      List<Events> getNextEvents(Date date, Users user)
      Loads new list of active events including given date and the events after this date if the given user is participant.
      List<Events> getPastEvents(Date date)
      Loads events from database where the date of the event is lower or equal to the date given.
      List<Events> getPastEvents(Date date, Users user)
      Loads events from database related to given user where the date of the event is lower or equal to the date given.
      void saveEvent(Events event)
      Saves the given in the database.
